Description:
SOUGHT AFTER WATER VIEWS
Located just off the bay end of Beacon Point road amongst established housing in a quiet neighborhood. A short stroll to cliff top walks along the water and a lovely secluded swimming spot. The block is elevated to the rear and has great potential to secure beautiful views from your new home. Oriented to take advantage of the sun throughout the day. Public transport, the local shopping strip and kindergarten are available close by.
Blocks of these proportions rarely present in established Clifton Springs. Approximately 16m x 42m with an area of 677m2 get your house plans ready.
Insights: 22 Camberwarra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Premium location offering views
Views of the bay and beyond, here's the opportunity to build and design a home to take advantage of the view. Surrounded by modern dwellings of class & distinction.
Located within minutes drive of the Drysdale shopping precinct, the Clifton Springs Boat Harbour, local schools & within walking distance to the beach, the golf club. The block is undulating enabling you to build your dream home with commanding panoramic bay views.
Contract of sale, Section 32 & further details available on request.
Block size 618 sqm. 20m wide by 30.9m deep.

Address: 157 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
The bay end of town
Located literally a hop, skip & a jump from the Adrian Mannix Foreshore Reserve via an access path. With the Safe Boat Harbour close by this home is perfectly located for the Fisho. Add to that the long garage, so you can be set up to go first thing while keeping your gear secure. The well established gardens welcome you home.
A spacious open plan living, dining & kitchen is light filled by the large windows.
Kitchen with wall oven, microwave nook, gas cooktop, plenty of bench space so you can cook & entertain.
The rear sunroom or retreat is a great room to get away as a playroom and overflow for guest to stay over.
The generous master bedroom with twin built in robes.
The second bedroom is comfortable & offers easy access to the bathroom.
A modern gas heater to warm you through the chill of winter.
The secluded backyard is a joy to meander & has a 'bits & bobs' tool shed.
Insights: 157 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Exciting options - plus outstanding bay views
You can look at this excellent property at least two different ways. Firstly it's an impeccably-presented, two-storey 80's double brick family home on a large block that you can move straight into. Or it could be an amazing opportunity to develop two or three townhouses (STCA) with superb northern views of the bay.
Currently it presents a wide driveway to an oversized double garage at the rear. On the ground floor, a generous lounge with garden views leads to a bright open plan dining space, and a well equipped kitchen beyond. A central passage reveals a second lounge (or 5th bedroom), a bedroom, a bathroom with shower and vanity, a separate WC, and a large laundry/study.
Upstairs, two bedrooms share a bathroom with a shower, bath and vanity, plus a separate WC, while the master bedroom boasts a walk-through dressing space to an ensuite with a shower and vanity. There is room for the whole family with ample storage inside and out, including room for caravan or boat.
The position is Clifton Springs at its spectacular best, so what you do with this outstanding block is up to you. Either way you win!
- Substantial 2-storey home on large block with superb views
- Ground floor includes two lounges, dining, and kitchen
- Euro-style appliances in kitchen plus new bench tops
- Also bedroom, bathroom with separate WC, and laundry
- Upstairs, 3 bedrooms and bathroom, master with ensuite
- Side driveway to large double lock-up garage/work shed
- Ducted gas hydronic heating throughout
- 3 phase power
- Potential to subdivide and build townhouses (STCA).
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Seachange in the Springs!
This has all the makings of a great first home, downsizer or investment. Located at the northern end of Jetty Road offering fabulous access to the lifestyle amenities of Clifton Springs: The Dell ; boat ramp & harbour; golf course and bowling club. For young families it’s an easy 2-minute bike ride to the Clifton Springs primary school on Jetty Road, and in the other direction to the preschool. The Pinaroo Avenue shops are just around the corner, and the Curlewis Woolworths is a quick drive to new Bayview Central shopping centre. This home is in brilliant condition and superbly presented, with notable upgrades throughout, including a sparkling bathroom. The open plan is freshly painted in a minimalist white that favours personal touches and is showcased with stunning hardwood flooring. Expansive glazing in the living area takes your gaze to the You Yangs on the Corio Bay horizon. This northern aspect and the spacious merbau deck are the perfect spot to entertain friends and watch the sunset. The bedrooms are well sized and share the hallway and close to the bathroom. The laundry is placed next to the kitchen making everyday tasks that little easier to manage. The u-shaped kitchen has a freestanding Blanco s/s cooker and flows to the dining and lounge area. All-season climate comfort is a promise with a Rinnai gas heater, positioned to flow through to the bedrooms, and split air-con will keep you comfortable in Summer. At the end of the long driveway is an oversized single-car garage/workshop, these two combined spaces allow for off-street parking for vehicles, boat or small caravan. The garden is low maintenance, and the utility shed helps keep the yard tidy. This is an affordable package that offers you coastal living on the highly sought-after Bellarine Peninsula. Don’t hesitate on this one!
Insights: 35 Jetty Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 174 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Country Club Classic
First time on the market in 35 years this 2 storey brick veneer family home offers you bay & golf course veiws.
Downstairs you have large family or rumpus room, a shower & toilet, huge under house storage plus internal access from the double car garage. Upstairs you have NSW spotted gum floors leading to the bedrooms, master has walk in robe and bedrooms 2 & 3 have built in robes. Plus a central bathroom with a seperate bath & shower. Also a study perfect for a home office or smaller 4th bedroom. Kitchen is wrapped in Tasmanian Oak cabinetry with lots cupboards & drawers featuring stainless steel appliances including double electric ovens, electric cook top, rangehood & dishwasher. Sliding doors out to deck from the dining gives stunning bay views of the you yangs. Generous lounge & formal dining is light filled also with sliding doors out to the deck. Out the back is another deck to entertain & enjoy eating alfresco. Landscaped gardens & vegetable patch on a generous 713m2 allotment. Walking distance to the Clifton Springs Golf Cub & The Dell. Also a short drive to local shopping centres, cafes, schools & medical facilities! Don't forget everything the Bellarine has to offer, boat ramps, bay, beaches award winning wineries & ferry services.
Insights: 174 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 49 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
One Of A Kind
A 'one of a kind' architectural build is complemented by 'one of a kind' panoramic bay views – creating a visual spectacle and the ultimate 'seachange' prospect. Raked ceilings, polished timber floorboards, feature bespoke triangular windows, a delightful sunken lounge, expansive north facing decked alfresco and a prime land holding of approximately 672m2 (corner allotment) further endorse this property's 'one of a kind' qualities!
• Three generous bedrooms; master complete with modernised ensuite, walk in robe and ceiling fan. The additional bedrooms have built in robes.
• A classic open plan design; grand proportions, towering raked ceilings and feature windows promote a wonderfully light and bright feel. A sunken lounge offers an inviting independent living area
• The kitchen 'serves up' a spatial delight, expansive benchtops, stainless steel appliances and excellent storage solutions. A glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to a decked alfresco with a northerly aspect across to the granite peaks of the You Yangs
• A double remote controlled garage, underhouse storage and the convenience of a corner allotment with side access provides further scope for an additional shed/garage (STCA)
• A prime landing of approximately 672m2; the convenience of strip shopping just a short stroll away, the waters edge literally down the road and believe it or not but the bus passes right by your door step
• Modernised bathrooms, freshly painted, new carpets throughout and all the modern comforts create a genuine 'turn key' and start enjoying from day one prospect
• This fine property ticks all the boxes and is stamped 'hot property' from the moment we go live – call today to start living the ultimate Bellarine Peninsula dream.
Insights: 49 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Cool Summer Breezes
Boasting a stylish, sleek contemporary flair this brand new residence of the highest calibre is sure to turn heads. A classic open plan design showcases expansive window features (double glazed) which frame truly spectacular water views and promote wonderful light filled living zones.
• Three beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite, walk in robe and floor to ceiling windows that boast water views. The 2 additional bedrooms form a guest wing and are serviced by a stunning family bathroom, complete with a luxurious free standing bath.
• A sophisticated kitchen design is nothing short of eye catching featuring a walk in pantry, custom cabinetry provides excellent storage solutions, dual stone bench tops, pendant lighting, charcoal splashback, stainless steel gas cook top and a Bosch dishwasher all further endorse the uncompromising design brief.
• This property possesses a classic open-plan design, crisp white finishes, striking polished timber floors and expansive windows enhance the free flowing living zone. A trio of glass stacker doors create a seamless connection to a hardwood decked alfresco (a glorious space to take in an early coffee and gaze across deep blue water vistas). A second decked alfresco provides a lovely sheltered alternative space to capture cool summer breezes as you admire the impressive outlook.
• Landscaped gardens provide a lovely tranquil setting presenting a custom Chinese garden courtyard, dedicated area for a veggie patch, brick paved pathways and a water tank.
• This fine residence boasts an impressive inclusions list to be discovered on further inspection. All the modern comforts built with efficient green living in mind and set within a peaceful court location completes the picture.
• A wonderful home for today and an excellent investment for the future. Call today and embrace the beauty of the Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
Neat, Sweet and Complete
Be prepared to have all your expectations well and truly exceeded with this value packed property that we have on offer!
Recently refurbished, leaving no stone unturned and fastidiously completed to a high standard with tasteful splashes of colour and design throughout. This home is ready for you to move into and enjoy the best of what the Bellarine has to offer. Situated in a quiet "no through road" and only moments to all major amenities also within proximity to the Bay,
The fore of the home hosts a generous sized first living area to the left and a designer kitchen overlooking meals to the right. The kitchen has been finished off in such a tasteful manner including stone benchtops, Italian 900mm free standing gas cooktop/oven, Smeg dishwasher, composite granite in-bench Blanco sink with extendable tap wear, pull out dual bins and soft close drawers and cupboards. Towards the rear of the home you will find a family room equipped with a split system, 3 bedrooms 2 with quality built-in robes, a very chic bathroom with ¾ feature tiling, double shower with seamless tiled base and dual shower heads, toilet, heat tactics and plantation shutters. A separate toilet and laundry including storage complete this comfortable home.
The front garden is manicured and low maintenance offering lovely street appeal, the back garden is divided up into practical areas, the first is an undercover entertaining area which has been astroturfed, fitted with café blinds and a ceiling fan, definitely a place of serenity and Zen! The grassed area has 2 garden sheds, fish pond and plenty of room to add your vegetable gardens.
Features of the home include gas central heating, reverse cycle heating/cooling, quality appliances, fittings and fixtures, new downlights/light switches, custom light fittings, new window furnishings, outdoor shower and reinstated double carport.
This home is definitely a stand out from the rest, inspect today to appreciate the quality and comfort this home has to offer.
Insights: 23 Carawatha Ave, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 39 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Renovate, Rent or Develop
With creative vision this four-bedroom, solid brick coastal home could become your dream abode or a sound investment with rental options or a savvy site for development (STCA). The options are bountiful and only limited by your imagination!
From the main entrance is a large living and dining area that is carpeted and houses a gas heater and large windows. Through a cavity door is a modest kitchen with Westinghouse appliances, breakfast bar, additional meals zone and good size laundry.
Further along the hallway are two bedrooms with BIRs, main with an en suite, a central bathroom, separate WC and optional study.
As it is the existing property has been modified for holiday makers with a third bedroom, en suite and lounge room located at the rear. Private access is attainable from the driveway and sliding doors lead you to an undercover al fresco space. This is calling out for an Airbnb host!
There is plenty of off-street carparking with a double carport that flows through to a paved outdoor section and onto a lockable garage with twin roller doors and workshop.
Clear the front garden or add a second storey and boom you’ve got yourself million dollar views across the bay. Over the road is the Clifton Springs Golf Club and five minutes away is the highly visited destination on the Bellarine, Jack Rabbit Vineyard. Set yourself up for the future and be close to schools, shops, sporting facilities, parks, public transport and Geelong.
Insights: 39 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Once In A Lifetime�
On offer is a once in a lifetime opportunity, situated in arguably the most revered location in Clifton Springs. This custom-built home situated on 590m2 offers an incredibly large and versatile floor plan, all while taking in sweeping North facing views of the Bay, You Yangs and Geelong.
This is your chance to secure a home in a tightly held pocket of the finest in Clifton Springs living. The home offers original 1970's charm which you can either embrace or renovate however, this location is FOREVER!
More than meets the eye with this home, so prepare to be in awe once you step foot inside. You're welcomed by a unique Sunburst' feature front door, which was locally manufactured as a Moonburst' and an entry nook with timber stairs that lead you to the upper floor. An open plan 1st living and informal dining flows into a formal lounge area, complete with an open fire, bar and sliding doors which lead you to the full-length balcony, encompassing the breath-taking Bay views. A formal dining room sits from the lounge and continues into the kitchen, which is equipped with a stainless-steel dishwasher, gas cooktop and oven, built-in-pantry and ample cupboard space. Completing the 1st floor are 2 well-appointed bedrooms with built-in-robes and a central bathroom.
Wandering back downstairs, you're greeted by a spacious 2nd living area, leading through to bedrooms 3 and 4, which both host built-in-robes. The central main bathroom is a masterpiece within itself, offering a large vanity, a tiled in luxury raised spa bath and a separate shower room. A well-equipped laundry with outdoor access completes this wing of the ground level.
A monstrous rumpus room sits at the fore of the ground level and sets the scene for what's to follow! A versatile 5th bedroom/study with built-in-robes also incorporates access to a large under-ground cellar. An additional bathroom with separate toilet, vanity and shower room completes the ground level's living quarters.
The extensive indoor/outdoor entertaining area is where your expectations will well and truly be exceeded! On offer is an indoor Spa room, complete with a near new, 5 seat Balboa Spa, which leads into your own separate indoor gym. The fully enclosed dining area truly incorporates the meaning of indoor/outdoor entertaining which is made a breeze by timber bi-fold doors to the back garden. Finished off by an open fire, pizza oven, surround sound speakers and also a nifty kitchenette which includes a bar fridge, dishwasher and ample storage - You will definitely be the envy of all your friends!
The back garden is neat and low maintenance, with mature fruit trees, a quaint sitting area and also access down the side of the home, which includes entry to the in-built garden shed.
Other features of this home include - ducted heating and cooling as well 2 additional electric heaters & gas wall heater, double lock up & secure carport, solar panels, original feature carpet & wallpaper, rewired electrics and workshop.
This home must be seen not only to be believed, but to be appreciated. Secure this home and you're a legitimate stone's throw away to the Bay and have secured one of only a hand full of homes that get to call Edge Water Drive home. The Bellarine Peninsula is BOOMING- why wait another second to call 29 Edge Water Drive home?
Insights: 29 Edgewater Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 96 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Something Truly Special
The Feel:
One of only a handful of homes with direct access to the picturesque Clifton Springs Golf Course, this
traditional style family abode exudes charm and warmth. Lush greenery and fragrant cottage gardens provide the perfect setting for a relaxed lifestyle here, all within a stroll to the Club Bistro, beaches, fantastic schools and bus services to Geelong.
The Facts:
-Spacious 3BR dual living home set on 604m² (approx)
-High ceilings and large windows capture light and views
-Formal lounge, relaxed living and light filled conservatory
-Kitchen with ss appliances, abundant storage and bench space
-Family-friendly floorplan, with scope for future changes if desired (STCA)
-Nestled within cottage gardens with rear access to golf course and walking tracks
-500m to the Club Bistro for dinner joining friendly locals and golfing community
-Master BR with ensuite, formal dining with potential for 4th/guest BR
-Gas ducted heating and cooling, gas log fire to conservatory
-DLUG with large powered workshop + double carport
The Owner Loves...
“From the moment you set foot within the front gate the scent of flowers in the garden hits you, we love the garden or golf course views from every room in the house. The access to the golf course provides additional recreation space for all ages, including walking tracks to the beach for dogs. It truly is something special.”

Address: 155 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Golf Course Precinct on 727 sqm of Land
This wonderful property in the sought after pocket of Clifton Springs has all the hallmarks of a much loved family home. Immaculately maintained, it features 3 comfortable bedrooms including Master with ensuite and large kitchen with gas appliances. A lovely spacious living area flows out to the outdoor undercover alfresco area sheltered from the elements with bistro blinds allowing for year round enjoyment and the property has been recently updated with new HWS and central heating. The landscaped rear garden has been designed to make good use of the 727 sqm allotment without requiring full time attention and is accessed via a convenient drive through from the garage. The keen golfer has the ability to access the golf course approx 250m away and is walking distance to the Club house and The Dell for the summer afternoons looking across Port Phillip Bay to the You Yangs.

Description:
Spacious Home on Large Block
This is a great family home comprising 4 bedrooms plus a study, 3 living areas, plus huge north facing 4m x 13m covered outdoor entertaining area. Well appointed kitchen has wide island bench, updated gas and electric cooking, double pantry and dishwasher. Open plan family and dining area overlooks the decking and gardens. Rear rumpus room has a world of possibilities for games or hobbies. Full ensuite and walk-in robe. Polished laminated timber floors plus ducted heating and cooling, Outside is a private garden courtyard, sunny rear deck, double garage plus extra 6m x 8m garage with high door access. Large 1272m2 block with established gardens and sealed circular driveway. Clifton Springs is the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula and is surrounded by golf courses, bay and surf beaches, parks and playgrounds, world class wineries, cafes, and restaurants. It is a great place to live.

Address: 203 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Family Living with A Stunning Aspect
With enticing views to the 9th hole of Clifton Springs Golf Club and the bay views beyond, this 1970s modernist classic has been recast as a contemporary four bedroom family home with spacious proportions and a stunning aspect.
Set on a generous block, bordered by a low maintenance garden, you'll feel at home in this property where the back garden blends into the uninterrupted view of the golf course. Afternoon light streams into the kitchen, dining and the first of two living spaces making meal times a picturesque experience, regardless of the weather. Al fresco dining on the undercover terrace will be a regular occurrence as you wile away the afternoons watching the golfers pass by. The tiled splashback, gas top 5 burner cooker and wall oven are complemented by generous cabinetry and a pull out range hood and hardwood timber flooring is a feature. There's a large laundry with direct garden access and plenty of room for the golf clubs in the carport storage space and garden shed.
Down the hall from the open plan zone, the four bedrooms are bright and welcoming with ceiling fans. Three of these are doubles and have BIRs with the single bedroom, being an ideal size for a kids bedroom, playroom or home office. There's a central family bathroom and adjacent to the second living room, a master bedroom overlooks the front garden and takes in an ensuite and ample WIR. This second living room once closed off from the rest of the home creates a superb parents retreat - perfect for some peace and quiet!
Positioned in one of the most desirable areas of Clifton Springs, this loved family home is located just a short walk from the Clifton Springs Bowling Club and pristine Clifton Springs Golf Club. The historic Dell, shops and boat ramp are a stone's throw away and commuting to Melbourne is a gentle affair thanks to the Portarlington -Melbourne ferry.
- Large 604sqm block with uninterrupted views of the Clifton Springs Golf Course and bay
- Al fresco dining terrace with stunning westerly aspect
- 4 bedrooms, including a master with ensuite and WIR
- Light and picturesque open plan kitchen, living and dining room
- Second living area can be closed off to create a parents retreat
- Incredible location, just a short walk to Clifton Springs shops and historic Dell
- Commute to Melbourne via ferry from Portarlington
Insights: 203 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
HIGH ON POTENTIAL
Set on a large elevated corner block, this 3 bedroom home will appeal to the first homebuyer or the astute investor. Just an 8 iron from the picturesque Golf Club this low maintenance property has plenty of potential. A series of rustic wooden steps leads to the north facing front deck and entry to the home, sitting high above the treetops.
With newly polished floor boards throughout the open plan kitchen/dining/living area and all rooms freshly painted, the home is light and bright and being so close to Port Phillip Bay there is a welcoming breeze through the wooden venetians. Newly installed wooden bench tops give the kitchen an added charm.
Down the hall, the 3 bedrooms all have spacious BIR's and ceiling fans, with the master bedroom having a wonderful outlook over the front deck and bay beyond. A central family bathroom has been updated and the laundry has outside access.
There are plenty of options for outdoor entertaining with an elevated paved alfresco dining terrace area and a spacious backyard for four legged and two legged friends to play! Plenty of storage is available under the house for the kayak or fishing rods and there is also a DLUG. The golf club, bowling club and boat harbour are a short stroll away, with shops, supermarket and schools close by. A fabulous opportunity to purchase your first home with a lifestyle that will be the envy of many!
- Large 701sqm elevated corner block
- Short stroll to golf and bowling clubs and boat harbour
- Open plan living/dining/kitchen
- 3 bedrooms, all with BIR and ceiling fans
- Spacious north facing elevated deck
- Alfresco dining terrace area
- Ample storage area under the house

A prime positioned commercial land parcel in the established Jetty Road retail precinct. Acquire at ground-zero and reap the savings of an affordable site, that is close to civil assets of Clifton Springs. Address: 1 Cliff Edge Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Rural Tranquility & Sublime Bay Views
In a highly sought after court location with absolutely gorgeous views across Corio Bay, this well-appointed family home is one of a kind. Not only will you be surrounded by just over 3 acres of prime rural land, but enjoy having direct access to Beacon Point Reserve leading straight down to the water.
-Contemporary 4BR dual living residence set on over 3 Acres in a sought after coastal court
-Uninterrupted views across Corio Bay and beyond, with the waterfront only metres away
-Quiet rural pocket with only one neighbour, with adjoining reserve ensuring a lifetime view
-Open living with a modern farmhouse feel offers exceptional indoor/outdoor flow
-Picture windows to the kitchen frame the relaxed rural vista and blue waters beyond
-Warm oak adorns the benchtops and a vast island will attract visitors and family to sit and chat
-Home cooks will love the high end ‘Belling' oven with classic styling and modern functionality
-Daily living is beneath rustic exposed beams, with formal dining and a lounge area
-The coonara efficiently warms this zone, with bedroom wings easily opened to share the heat
-Split system heating and cooling also assists in living, master and minor bedroom wings
-3 queen sized bedrooms with BIRs occupy the east end of the home along with a handy rumpus
-The family sized bathroom with great storage and bench space caters well to growing children
-To the west, the master enjoys water views, a WIR and ensuite with private Japanese style garden
-Outside, the solar heated in-ground pool promises plenty of fun for children of all ages
-Parents can BBQ with friends and watch the sunset over Corio Bay and the You Yangs
-Take the dogs for a leisurely walk into Beacon Point Reserve and follow the beach to Portarlington
-Or head along Clifton Springs beach towards The Dell, and perhaps to the Golf Club for dinner
-Ideal for hobby farming, with separate paddocks and enclosures for farm animals or pets
-New rabbit-proof fencing, feature garden beds with newly planted natives and extensive hedging
-Lock up garaging for up to 3 cars, with custom-built high clearance shed for a boat or caravan
-Shed features cleaning station with hot/cold water and recycled timber windows framing views
-Extensive concrete driveway offers plenty of guest parking and space for children to ride safely
-Situated amongst award-winning wineries, surf beaches and coastal towns of the Bellarine
-Great local primary and secondary colleges, with Geelong only 25mins away by bus or car
Enjoy lifelong water views and a lifestyle like no other, tucked away in this rural paradise yet still so well connected to everything your growing family will ever need. Arrange an inspection today!

Description:
Walk to the Beach & Golf Club
This neat 3 bedroom brick home has been lovingly cared for since new. Located in a quiet court within easy walking distance to the beach & Golf club. Sunny north facing sunken lounge with separate formal dining area. Tiled kitchen with electric cooking and spacious twin pantries and adjoining family/meals area. 3 double bedrooms and central bathroom. Outside is a covered rear patio, double steel garage and a double carport suitable for under cover boat or trailer storage. Established gardens with the roses blooming. A picture perfect setting.
Insights: 3 Carnival Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
How's The Serenity?
Once every so often you are lucky enough to be introduced to a property that simply 'grabs you'; charming, unique, character filled and boasting an unrivalled tranquility which simply says 'home'!
• Set within a classic green leafy pocket of Clifton Springs this 'one of a kind' 3 bedroom property resides effortlessly in its peaceful surrounds
• Upon entry you will be instantly impressed by towering cathedral ceilings (complete with dual feature ceiling windows) and a sea of Tasmanian Oak polished floor boards.
• A light filled living area is a truly charming zone; a Coonara sitting on a bed of slate tiles further endorses a warm welcoming 'feel' and a split system provides heating and cooling conveniences at the flick of a switch.
• The kitchen oozes character; timber cabinetry and expansive benchtops, feature tiled splash back and new stainless steel appliances blend modern convenience with the romance of yesteryear.
• Stunning bi-fold doors provide a seamless connection to a private and sheltered alfresco, recycled timber panelled ceiling, exposed aggregrate concrete keep to the rustic setting
• 3 generously proportioned bedrooms; master is bathed in natural light and boasts a feature recycled timber wall. All the bedrooms have built in robes and ceiling fans
• A modernised bathroom ensures this property is a genuine 'turn key' and enjoy from day 1 prospect
• Side rear access provides room enough for the cars, boat, jet ski and there is even a designated space for the caravan… this property is a genuine 'lifestyle' home
• An additional garage/shed is fully powered with concrete floor and a remote controlled roller door.
• Landscaped front gardens with an emphasis on low maintenance are complemented by a generous rear yard, a mature Gleditsia tree provides wonderful summer shade with its gorgeous lime green canopy. A wonderful feature of this home is the pedestrian gate access to the wide open spaces of the neighbouring parklands.
• I can say without a moment of doubt that this property will be in high demand and swift action will be required to call 41 Panpandi Drive, Clifton Springs home!!
Insights: 41 Panpandi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
DO NOT THINK TWICE, BUY WELL FOR THE FUTURE, WILL NOT LAST!
No. 9 is affordable, well maintained and in a quiet location, this is an excellent buy for the astute buyer. A wide entrance , generous lounge room as well as a second living combining kitchen, meals and some sitting space all opening to undercover patio space, this overlooks leafy and matured garden. Three bedrooms, master large with WIR, two more both have BIR'S. Central big 2 way bathroom, separat toilet and laundry. Features include gas heater, fans, good storage and pantry. Single garage with tendam access to backyard, room for more vehicles. Do not hesitate this is a gem for the first time buy , downsizer or invest for the future.
